document_data.name: ''Powder of the Hero's Heart''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Powder of the hero's heart''''' was an [[enchanted]] substance that instilled bravery when inhaled.
document_data.Description: This powder was dull red in color.
document_data.Powers: ''Powder of the hero's heart'' filled the hearts of anyone inhaling it with bravery and negated any magical or nonmagical fear. This effect lasted for 5â€“20 minutes.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Batina al-Shaat]], a [[moralist]] priest from [[Zakhara]], carried some ''powder of the hero's heart''.{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Cardsheets}}
